description: The 21-year-old was spotted out in New York City on Thursday. Combined with her thigh-high snake print boots, Gigi was a magnet for attention as she headed out in the chilly Big Apple.
title: Gigi Hadid wears revealing all-white look in New York
title_page: Gigi Hadid wears revealing all-white look in New York | Daily Mail Online
text:
She was stepping out in snowy New York City.
But the Big Apple's practically freezing cold temperatures didn't stop Gigi Hadid from showing a little skin in as she headed out in an all-white look on Thursday.
The 21-year-old was spotted flashing plenty of leg in an unusual pair of trousers that had two long side slits.
Scroll down for video
Putting in the leg work! New York's practically freezing cold temperatures didn't stop Gigi Hadid from showing a little skin in as she headed out for her day in an all-white look on Thursday
Combined with her thigh-high snake print boots, Gigi was a magnet for attention as she headed out in the chilly Big Apple.
The statuesque star looked gorgeous as she wore her light brunette tresses down in a bedhead style that swept across her face.
She sported a pair of circular print sunglasses and appeared to have worn very little makeup.
A M2MALLETIER backpack slung over her back, the stylish climbed inside her car as she got her day going.
Oh la la: The model's skirt split open even further as she negotiated the snowy walkways
These boots were made for walking! Combined with her thigh-high snake print boots, Gigi was a magnet for attention as she headed out in the chilly Big Apple
Forces of nature: Hadid ducked her head as she faced a gust of breeze
Gigi is not only one of the biggest names in fashion, but she is also dating one of the hottest stars in music.
The model has been with former One Direction singer Zayn Malik since November 2015, and the couple recently teamed up professionally for Versace's diffusion fashion line, Versus.
Zayn stars in a the fashion line's spring-summer 2017 campaign, which was shot by Gigi at Hollywood venue Chateau Marmont.
Natural beauty: She sported a pair of circular print sunglasses and appeared to have worn very little makeup
Matters of the heart: The catwalk queen is not only one of the biggest names in fashion, but she is also dating one of the hottest stars in music, Zayn Malik
Reflecting on the shoot in an official statement, Zayn admitted he revelled in the opportunity to work with Gigi and designer Donatella Versace.
'It was sick to work with Versus,' he said. 'Dontella is a G. It was extra special that Gigi shot the campaign.
'Looking forward to following up with my Versus collection that drops in June.'
Change of pace: The model headed out later and dressed more for the weather this time
Low key: the young star wore black leggings with a white turtleneck and coat then accessorized the look with blue boots and Givenchy hat
The celebrated designer was equally complimentary about her young muse, adding: 'The Versus campaign captures everything that is special about ZAYN, Gigi and Adwoa.
'They are young people who define the mood of their generation with their honesty, energy and their love.'
Filmed by Gigi using iPhones and digital cameras, the campaign images will feature individually on social media and collectively in print.
